roleset.name: include in some group

role.descr: first or all things connected when in one constituent
second thing connected to first when separate mention

example.name: Arg1, all things connected in one mention
example.text: The connection between church and state is inescapable.

example.name: Args 0 & 2
example.text: John's first connection to the Internet occurred yesterday at noon.
example.note: Arg1 is implied (of his computer), but John is agent.

example.name: Args 0, 1, 2
example.text: Many of those Evangelicals may not agree with his connection of environmentalism to sin.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: John's connection of department computers to shady websites using an unsecure connection led to a record number of viruses on the machines.

example.name: just arg 2
example.text: Without admitting or denying wrongdoing , the firm consented to findings that it failed to respond `` in a timely manner '' to the NASD 's requests for information in connection with a customer complaint .
example.note: Please note that the PP containing arg2 does not contain all things connected. Just because arg1 doesn't appear in the span does not mean it does not exist elsewhere.

roleset.note: Roleset based on verb entry connect.01, OntoNotes grouping connection-n senses 1, 4 & 8; maps to VN class mix-22.1-2-1. Comparison to verb-associate.01. Framed by Claire.
